governor. Mike Pence told supporters of his decision Thursday afternoon in a letter. He did not announce his candidacy for governor, but sent a clear signal of his interest in seeking the office. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence said in the letter.
